about_the_game: Trying to sneak some extra game time in at work or school?   Whether you have a suspicious manager, teacher, or parent lurking around it's good to show them how productive you could have been.   Use this boss key to hide your activities or just give yourself a break for a quick run to the fridge for up to 30 seconds.
detailed_description: Trying to sneak some extra game time in at work or school?   Whether you have a suspicious manager, teacher, or parent lurking around it's good to show them how productive you could have been.   Use this boss key to hide your activities or just give yourself a break for a quick run to the fridge for up to 30 seconds.
name: Cash Grab - Boss Key

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compliant Video chipset
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Sound Compliant Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Better
  • Processor: 2.8 Ghz Dual Core Processor or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compliant Video chipset
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Sound Compliant Device
